# Emplot

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

A clean theme for `ggplot2` with matching `geom` defaults.

## Installation

Install from [GitHub](https://github.com/) using the [devtools](https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/devtools) package:

```{r, eval = FALSE}
devtools::install_github("dbarrows/emplot")
```

Possible CRAN version in the future.

## Examples

```{r scatter}
library(ggplot2)
library(emplot)

ggplot(mpg, aes(displ, hwy, color = class)) +
    geom_point()
```

```{r histogram}
ggplot(mpg, aes(displ)) +
    geom_histogram(bins = 30)
```

## Options

The grid can be forced on/off with the `grid` option:

```{r grid_off}
ggplot(iris, aes(Sepal.Length, Sepal.Width, color = Species)) +
    geom_point() +
    geom_smooth(method = lm, alpha = 0.25) +
    theme_emplot(grid = FALSE)
```

The font can be changed to a serif with the `serif` option (for the [Tufte](https://www.edwardtufte.com/tufte/) look):

```{r serif_on}
ggplot(iris, aes(Petal.Length)) +
    geom_histogram(bins = 30) +
    scale_y_continuous(breaks = seq(5, 25, by = 5)) +
    geom_hline(yintercept = seq(5, 25, by = 5), col = "white", size = 1) +
    theme_emplot(grid = FALSE, serif = TRUE)
```

```{r tufte_line}
library(tidyverse)
mpg %>%
    mutate(cyl = as.factor(cyl)) %>%
    ggplot(aes(displ, hwy, color = cyl)) +
        geom_point(size = 1.25) +
        geom_smooth(method = lm, se = FALSE, size = 0.5) +
        theme_emplot(grid = FALSE, serif = TRUE) +
        scale_color_grey(end = 0.75)
```
